rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0001
rows.name:
Now, hurry up and go
see Chairman Bahn, mo!

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0002
rows.name: Should I ask Punin-san a question?

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0003
rows.name: Ask where the Chairman's room is.

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0004
rows.name: Ask how Punin-san has been recently.

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0005
rows.name:
The Chairman's office is
through the Avaritia Bazaar
and up the stairs, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0006
rows.name:
Don't stand around loitering!
You're young, so run along, mo!

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0007
rows.name:
So-so, I suppose, mo... My wife
left me, but other than that,
nothing's really changed, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0008
rows.name:
Every day, I'm Chairman Bahn's
errand... Er, I mean, I'm busy
every day as his right-hand man, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0009
rows.name:
They say the poor have no
free time, but I'd love a
vacation now and then, mo...

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0010
rows.name:
Still, a reward worth 100
months of Punin's salary...
I'm incredibly jealous, mo...

rows.label: tlk00040101_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] If this goes well, I should treat
him to about ten Samod...
